column5: I saw a advertisement on the Line Dancer today on WFN. Has anyone tried it and had any success, i'm thinking of trying this out next year.  Here is a site i found also: http://www.linedancerinc.com/
hey, hey, hey, i was just asking if anybody auctually bought the thing. I saw someone up at Bass lake with it and he said he loved it, was just asking if anybody on here has...

Laugh all you want....  I seen the add and made one from a coathanger.... and it makes a difference while reeling in a crankbait or spoon....especially for Pike...can't say it makes a difference for any other species.  The line must be unclipped while fighting the fish.....but I must admit  It takes a while to get used to the pulsations while reeling ... doesn't feel natural.  To each his own... it seems to work for me.  :Gonefishing:
You can't fight the fish with the line in the linedancer. Ever fish you have to remove the line. I made mine from a coat hanger.
